name: Dawn Destiny's Child
description:
Dawn Destiny's Child is an independent game with a storyline turn based combat mode, developed by only two people. The game includes various gameplay methods such as making potions, creating weapons, recruiting heroes, and washing hero attributes. The game is mainly based on magical storylines, returning to the style of traditional RPG games.
In the game, players will play the role of a tribal chieftain, leading their tribe through various levels. Experience various tests and tribulations from monsters and demons. Ultimately, unlock the secrets about humans, demons, and even the world.
Kind reminder:
In various interactions with NPCs, please be cautious in choosing the decisions you want to make, as this can lead to completely different plot directions and endings.
The story structure of the game includes stories from different periods such as ancient times, the Day of Destruction, the Seven Kills, the Wasteland Age, and the Underground World. If you only complete one ending, you may not fully understand the entire story, so you need to try to complete all the endings as much as possible. Only in this way can you truly understand the entire storyline.
